productData.shortDescription: Google Home delivers all the functionality of the Google Assistant app. It answers questions, provides current news, plays music, manages everyday tasks, streams videos to your TV and much more. Just speak and it responds.
productData.longDescription:
Google Home delivers all the functionality of the Google Assistant app. It answers questions, provides current news, plays music, manages everyday tasks, streams videos to your TV and much more. Just speak and it responds.

  • Google Home brings the Google Assistant app that fits in anywhere
  • You can now make hands-free calls to the US and Canada through your Google Home device
  • Answers questions about the latest weather, traffic, driving directions, store hours, flight information, finance, sports and more
  • Manages everyday tasks, sets alarms, starts timers, adds items to your shopping list
  • Plays music from YouTube Music and Google Play Music or streams audio directly from your phone
  • Streams videos to your TV with Chromecast
  • Adjusts your home's Nest thermostat
  • High excursion speaker delivers HiFi sound quality
  • Far-field microphones let it hear your commands reliably and accurately
  • WiFi enabled
  • Compatible with iPhone and Android
  • Plastic housing
  • Measures 3.8" L x 3.8" W x 5.62" H
  • Cord measures 70" L
  • Imported
  • Model GA3A00417A14
